item.title: NRG 预计本季度将签署新的美国数据中心协议
item.description: NRG 能源公司正在为 "全国各地 "的美国数据中心提供电力，据这家独立发电商的高层管理人员透露，该公司将在第二季度财报中披露相关细节。【原文：NRG Energy Inc. is working on deals to power US data centers “all over the country” and will reveal details with second-quarter results, according to the top executive of the independent generator.】

item.title: 我站起来跑了"：一个人如何在造成 241 人死亡的空难中幸存下来
item.description: 周四，当印度航空公司的 AI171 航班坠毁时，拉梅什-维什瓦斯库马尔（Ramesh Vishwaskumar）坐在经济舱的第一排，迎来了他一生中最痛苦也是最幸运的时刻。【原文：As Air India Flight AI171 descended toward its doom on Thursday, Ramesh Vishwaskumar sat in the first row of economy class — headed for one of the most harrowing and luckiest moments of his life.】

item.title: 澳大利亚富人为退休储蓄新税做好准备
item.description: 由于人们担心澳大利亚 4.1 万亿澳元（约合 2.7 万亿美元）的养老金制度正在成为高额财富积累的工具，澳大利亚正着手对最富有的退休储蓄者征收新税。【原文：Australia is forging ahead with a new tax on its richest retirement savers amid concerns that the country’s A$4.1 trillion ($2.7 trillion) pensions system is becoming a high-wealth accumulation vehicle.】

item.title: 中国被迫让无利可图的企业继续生存，以挽救就业和避免动乱
item.description:
面对2001年以来亏损最多的工业企业，习近平正试图在不引发大规模裁员的情况下整顿经济。【原文：

Saddled with the most loss-making industrial companies since 2001, Xi Jinping is trying to clean up his economy without triggering mass layoffs.

】

item.title: BPCE 即将以近 70 亿欧元的价格收购新银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Lone Star Funds 已决定出售葡萄牙贷款公司 Novo Banco SA，并已与法国银行集团 BPCE 展开独家讨论。【原文：Lone Star Funds has decided to pursue a sale of Portuguese lender Novo Banco SA and has entered into exclusive discussions with French banking group BPCE, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 苹果公司计划于 2026 年春季发布被推迟的 Siri 人工智能升级版
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc. ）已将推迟发布的 Siri 升级版的内部发布目标定在 2026 年春季，这标志着苹果公司在人工智能扭亏为盈的努力中迈出了关键一步。【原文：Apple Inc. has set an internal release target of spring 2026 for its delayed upgrade of Siri, marking a key step in its artificial intelligence turnaround effort.】

item.title: 梅塔和苹果尝试截然不同的战略，追赶人工智能的脚步
item.description: 两家最大的科技公司正在采取截然不同的方法，在人工智能领域展开竞争。但首先...【原文：Two of the biggest technology companies are taking radically different approaches to compete on AI. But first…】

item.title: Adobe 展望未来，人工智能工具备受青睐
item.description: Adobe 公司对本季度的销售业绩作出了强劲的展望，平息了投资者对这家创意软件领军企业在与人工智能后起之秀的竞争中落后的忧虑。【原文：Adobe Inc. gave a strong sales outlook for the current quarter, quieting investor anxieties that the leader in creative software is falling behind in a competition with AI-focused upstarts.】

item.title: Pimco 为与 Saks-Neiman Marcus 交易相关的贷款聘请顾问
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：A Pacific Investment Management Co.-led group holding loans tied to the sale of Neiman Marcus Group has tapped advisers to help ensure they get repaid when the debt comes due next year.】

item.title: 马瑞利获准在破产之初借款 5.19 亿美元
item.description: 破产汽车零部件供应商马瑞利控股公司（Marelli Holdings Co.【原文：Bankrupt auto-parts supplier Marelli Holdings Co. won court approval to borrow $518.9 million to help fund its reorganization after delaying a request for some parts of a financing package questioned by a federal bankruptcy watchdog.】

item.title: 迪纳波利称纽约市每年可能面临 130 亿美元的预算缺口
item.description: 纽约市主计长托马斯-迪纳波利（Thomas DiNapoli）表示，纽约市可能会出现高达 130 亿美元的年度赤字，因为纽约市对社会服务和加班费用的预算不足。【原文：New York City may be headed for annual deficits of as much as $13 billion because it under-budgets costs for social services and overtime, according to state Comptroller Thomas DiNapoli.】

item.title: Sunnova 获得 9000 万美元生命线以支持破产出售
item.description: Sunnova Energy International Inc.获得法院批准，开始动用一笔 9000 万美元的新破产贷款，这笔资金将帮助这家屋顶太阳能公司在破产保护程序中出售业务的同时继续维持运营。【原文：Sunnova Energy International Inc. won court approval to start drawing on a new $90 million bankruptcy loan, funding that will help keep the rooftop solar company afloat while it sells its business in Chapter 11.】

item.title: Scale AI 挑选新首席执行官，王建宙将在获得投资后加入 Meta
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，在获得 Meta Platforms 公司数十亿美元的投资后，Scale AI 计划提拔首席战略官 Jason Droege 担任下一任首席执行官。【原文：Scale AI plans to promote Chief Strategy Officer Jason Droege to serve as its next chief executive officer following a multibillion-dollar investment from Meta Platforms Inc., according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 米莱获胜，阿根廷通胀创大流行病以来最慢纪录
item.description: 阿根廷的月通胀率放缓至大流行病高峰期以来的最低水平，为哈维尔-米莱伊总统在关键的中期投票前赢得了重大胜利。【原文：Argentina’s monthly inflation slowed to the lowest level since the height of the pandemic, scoring a major victory for President Javier Milei ahead of a crucial midterm vote.】

item.title: 期权交易员押注美元 "卖美 "行动暂停
item.description: 美元的交易价格创下了三年来的新低，但期权交易员们打赌，世界储备货币的疯狂抛售将在未来几周内逐渐平息。【原文：The dollar is trading at a three-year low, but options traders are betting the frenzied selloff in the world’s reserve currency will peter out over the next few weeks.】

item.title: 美国生物燃料制造商陷入低迷，等待特朗普政策出台
item.description: 白宫正在紧锣密鼓地准备最终宣布新的生物燃料混合规则，这是对过去二十年来支撑美国农业的重要支持。但对于一些以大豆为原料的柴油生产商来说，此举并不足以将他们从长达数月的低迷中解救出来，因为低迷已导致工厂倒闭和裁员。【原文：The White House is gearing up to finally announce its new rules on biofuel blending, critical support for the industry that’s underpinned American farming over the past two decades. But for some producers of diesel made from soybeans, the move won’t be enough to rescue them from a months-long downturn that’s led to plant closings and layoffs.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）认为特朗普关税前全球贸易激增的势头将逐渐减弱
item.description: 国际货币基金组织看到有迹象表明，在全球经济仍面临高度不确定性的情况下，因美国总统唐纳德-特朗普加征关税而导致的贸易和经济活动的增长已开始减弱。【原文：The International Monetary Fund is seeing signs that the rise in trade and activity to front-run US President Donald Trump’s tariffs is beginning to unwind as the global economy still faces heightened uncertainty.】

item.title: 宾夕法尼亚州立大学获得 5 亿美元信贷额度，面临联邦资金压力
item.description: 在常春藤盟校继续面临来自特朗普政府的联邦资金压力之际，宾夕法尼亚大学的理事们获得了总额达 5 亿美元的信贷额度。【原文：The trustees of the University of Pennsylvania secured lines of credit totaling $500 million as Ivy League schools continue to face federal funding pressures from the Trump administration.】

item.title: 重要参议员反对美联储停止向银行支付利息的计划
item.description: 参议院银行委员会主席蒂姆-斯科特（Tim Scott）表示，他反对就得克萨斯州议员特德-克鲁兹（Ted Cruz）的提案迅速采取行动，该提案将禁止美联储向银行支付储备金利息，以帮助支付唐纳德-特朗普总统的税收和支出方案。【原文：Senate Banking Committee Chairman Tim Scott said he opposes swift action on a proposal from Texas’ Ted Cruz that would bar the Federal Reserve from paying interest on reserves to banks to help pay for President Donald Trump’s tax and spending package.】

item.title: Eurizon 的詹说：放宽美国资本规则将降低国债收益率
item.description: Eurizon SLJ Capital 认为，美国政府利用补充杠杆率放宽对银行的资本要求，很可能会释放出现金，导致国债收益率下降。【原文：Relaxing the US government’s capital requirements for banks using the supplementary leverage ratio will likely free up cash and lead to lower Treasury yields, according to Eurizon SLJ Capital.】

item.title: 特朗普政府下令 50 万移民离开美国
item.description: 根据拜登时代针对古巴、海地、尼加拉瓜和委内瑞拉的假释计划进入美国的移民已经开始收到终止通知，敦促他们离开美国。【原文：Immigrants admitted to the US from a Biden-era parole program for Cuba, Haiti, Nicaragua, and Venezuela have begun receiving notices of termination urging them to depart the US.】

item.title: 工会接受薪酬协议，南非铁路公司避免罢工
item.description: 南非国有港口和货运铁路公司与两个公认的工会达成了薪酬协议，避免了一场可能中断矿产和农产品出口的罢工。【原文：South Africa’s state-owned ports and freight-rail company reached a pay deal with its two recognized labor unions, averting a strike that threatened to disrupt mineral and agricultural exports.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易战持续，加拿大反关税支持率下降
item.description: 加拿大人继续支持对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税浪潮进行报复，但随着贸易战的持续，他们的热情有所减退。【原文：Canadians continue to support retaliating against US President Donald Trump’s wave of tariffs, but their fervor has waned as the trade war wears on.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 Chime 首次公开募股（IPO）耗资 8.64 亿美元，首日涨幅高达 66
item.description: Chime Financial Inc. 在首次公开募股中筹集了 8.64 亿美元，发行价高于市场定价范围，首次上市即大涨 66%。【原文：Chime Financial Inc. jumped as much as 66% in its trading debut after raising $864 million in an initial public offering priced above the marketed range.】

item.title: 美国监管机构称数据中心对电网构成威胁
item.description: 负责监管电网的美国机构罕见地发出警告称，与电网连接的大型数据中心目前是电网可靠性面临的最大近期风险之一。【原文：Big data centers connecting to power grids is now one of the greatest near-term risks to reliability, according to a rare warning by the US agency charged with overseeing the sector.】

item.title: 东非计划增加支出以抵消全球风险和援助削减的影响
item.description: 东非财政部长们将计划支出增加到创纪录的水平，以维持经济增长，减轻地缘政治风险和外国援助削减的影响。【原文：East African finance chiefs increased planned spending to a record to sustain economic growth and mitigate the effects of geopolitical risks and cuts in foreign aid.】

item.title: 美国财政部 30 年期债券拍卖需求强劲
item.description: 30 年期国债拍卖吸引了强劲的需求，这表明 29 万亿美元的市场到目前为止还没有出现长期债券买方全面出击的情况。【原文：An auction of 30-year Treasuries drew solid demand in a sign that the $29 trillion market is so far avoiding an all-out buyers’ strike in long-term bonds.】

item.title: 研究表明，艾芬豪铜矿的洪水是自己造成的
item.description: 根据运营商艾芬豪矿业有限公司（Ivanhoe Mines Ltd. ）公布的初步调查结果，中断刚果民主共和国一座大型铜矿产出的地震活动似乎是人为造成的。【原文：Seismic activity that disrupted output at a massive copper mine in the Democratic Republic of Congo appears self-induced, according to preliminary findings released by operator Ivanhoe Mines Ltd.】

item.title: 科力创新牵头竞购价值 80 亿美元的清洁能源公司 Cubico
item.description: 据知情人士透露，西班牙最大的可再生能源基金 Qualitas Energy 是收购清洁能源公司 Cubico Sustainable Investments 的领跑者。【原文：Spain’s largest renewable fund Qualitas Energy is the frontrunner to acquire clean-energy company Cubico Sustainable Investments, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: AMD 首席执行官预计到 2028 年人工智能处理器市场规模将超过 5000 亿美元
item.description: 先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.首席执行官丽莎-苏（Lisa Su）表示，未来三年人工智能处理器市场的增长速度将超过预期，该公司正试图挑战英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Advanced Micro Devices Inc. Chief Executive Officer Lisa Su said the market for AI processors will grow faster than expected over the next three years as her company attempts to challenge Nvidia Corp.’s industry dominance.】
